pr_title: 1939: Fixing Preset Loading and Reworking Campaign Options Initial Value Load

timeline.message: Part 1 of implementing CampaignOptions rework for presets
Finishing changes relating to Random Skill Preferences and Campaign Options
Implementing SPA and Skill Type changes

timeline.bodyText: This probably ought to go into MekHQ preferences, but not for this PR.
timeline.author: NickAragua

replies.bodyText: On my current list to do, just not in this PR.
replies.author: Windchild292

timeline.bodyText: What's the point of having this method if it does nothing and isn't used anyway?
timeline.author: NickAragua

replies.bodyText: This is something that we should have, but was broken it seems.
replies.author: Windchild292

timeline.bodyText: I assume this construct automatically closes the input stream regardless of whether the try/catch block throws an exception or not?
timeline.author: NickAragua

replies.bodyText: Exactly, so you don't have to worry about adding it yourself or not having it closed following an exception.
replies.author: Windchild292
